page.title: 05BUSINESSES,PRODUCTS,SERVICES
page.content:
BUSINESSES,PRODUCTS,SERVICES AND JOBS. Many local people work - or worked,for the past five years have seen the end of many major employers - outside our immediate area.However,we made a sur- vey of local businesses,and those which replied are listed below,togeth- er with a summary of their products or services and number of employees:
A.M.& C.M.SUPPLY CO. employ 3 market & maintain high pressure cleaners.
BAYNES TEXTILE RENTAL SERVICES emp.40 hirers & cleaners of industrial work- wear,cabinet towels,dust control mats.
BISHOP AUCKLAND PRECAST CONCRETE Emp.85. Mfrs. of concrete building components. {CONTINUED ON PAGE 6}...............
